attributes.action: ensure, ultimately, all domestic gas is used first to generate electricity 100% efficiently by facilitating micro CHP by all possible means
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the current global warming context NO gas should be burnt without using it first to generate electricity before using the waste heat for central and water heating. This saves 60% of the carbon load of major power stations and works best in winter when power is most needed, unlike solar panels. Every home with gas central heating can participate.
